Description: Site Establishment Design Drawing Set - CAD drafting and production (4 drawings)
Notes: Allowance for drawing production without vendor quotes or rate tables

Description: Site Establishment Technical Specification - specification writing (2 specifications)
Notes: Allowance for specification writing without rate tables

Description: Site Establishment Procedures - procedure development (3 procedures)
Contractor's Equipment Schedule - project controls documentation (2 documents)
Road Access & Security Planning - access/security process documentation (3 plans)
Notes: Allowance for security planning and procedure development

Description: Pre-Works Road Condition Survey - field survey and photo documentation
Notes: Allowance for surveyor services without vendor quote

Description: Post-Works Road Condition Survey - survey and deficiency closeout
Road Deficiency Remediation - asphalt patching and restoration work
Notes: Placeholder for road restoration; highly variable based on actual damage

Description: Temporary Water Supply Design - utility design drawings (3 drawings)
Notes: Allowance for water supply design effort

Description: Temporary Water Supply Materials - pipe fittings backflow preventer valves
Notes: Material allowance without vendor quotes or site layout distances

Description: Temporary Water Supply Installation - plumbing labor connection testing
Notes: Installation labor allowance without rate tables

Description: Security Gate & Access Control Installation - gate hardware and system install
Notes: Allowance for security equipment and installation

Description: Temporary Site Facilities - Materials (office trailers welfare facilities fencing)
Notes: Material component of site facilities allowance; breakdown: trailers $300k fencing $150k misc $50k

Description: Temporary Site Infrastructure - Construction (laydown electrical utilities signage)
Notes: Construction component of site infrastructure allowance; breakdown: laydown $150k electrical $120k welfare $80k

Description: Security Gate Staffing - construction phase security operations
Notes: 24-month gate staffing allowance (12hr/day 6day/week @ $30/hr); hours TBD from schedule

Description: Construction Indirects - field supervision site overhead QA/QC (factor-based)
Notes: 18% of CD base ($475k CD × 0.18); factor from fallback model
2% of MAT = 2% × $520k; factor from fallback model
